titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit Members from earning outside earned income, effective January 1, 1987.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XLVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit, after December 31, 1986, a Member from earning outside earned income or from accepting honoraria.
